channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Palantir’s stock surges as AI demand drives another record quarter
item.description: Palantir’s guidance vastly exceeds expectations, with the company projecting 61% growth for the year

item.title: Silver plunges into a bear market for the first time since 2022. Here’s how long it may last.
item.description: A more than 30% one-day drop in silver late last week pulled prices for the metal into a bear market for the first time since 2022.

item.title: What would end this government shutdown — and how tax refunds and air travel are affected in the meantime
item.description: A partial U.S. government shutdown entered its third day Monday, but the closure is widely expected to be short-lived.

item.title: How the stock market’s big turnaround on Monday put the S&P 500 back in record territory
item.description: Small-caps and other signs of the ‘rotation’ beyond mega-cap tech were out in force to start February

item.title: Here’s the one thing the bond market is hoping to avoid on Wednesday
item.description: Any sign that the Treasury might significantly increase the sizes of its future note and bond auctions could rattle traders.

item.title: Two ways for U.S. investors to cash in on the weak dollar
item.description: A softening U.S. greenback could mean it's time for investors to look abroad for opportunities, according to Oppenheimer.

item.title: Boring but beautiful — This real estate stock reporting Monday has room to run, says Jay Woods
item.description: Investor and trader Jay Woods said there's a good trading set-up in shopping mall owner Simon Property Group this week.

item.title: This chemical stock has the potential for a big turnaround higher, says Katie Stockton
item.description: Katie Stockton takes a look at the materials sector, including one stock that could break out soon.

item.title: The risk-reward on this payments stock looks attractive. How to trade it using a risk reversal options trade
item.description: Options trader Michael Khouw breaks down this call spread risk reversal on this payments name.

item.title: The AI trend can give dividend aristocrats a boost, Raymond James says
item.description: After years of underperformance, the tide could be starting to shift for dividend stocks, according to Raymond James.
